title: Bubble Escape
description: Navigate the bubbles to the exit without getting popped by the spikes. More the bubbles escape, more the scores you get. Play through 30 levels. Be careful with the bubble jiggles.
instructions: Use WASD from keyboard or on screen joystick to move bubbles around.

title: Grass Ranch
description: Grass Ranch is a super fun and relaxing casual game that makes you a true ranch grass-mowing master. If you like to complete simple and fun tasks in a cozy environment, then you can't miss this game. In this world of green grass, you will mow grass constantly. Keep mowing the lawn and feed some cute animals.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Darts Master:Cartoon 3D
description: Dear dart experts and those who want to become dart experts. Please showcase your talents to the fullest on this thrilling dart journey. Collect and enrich your dart warehouse with the goal of overcoming all challenges. Experience the joy of different dart competitions.
instructions: Winning by throwing darts.

title: Bull Runner
description: Take control of a powerful bull as it charges forward at full speed! Smash through obstacles, knock over stickmen, and leave destruction in your wake. How far can you go before something stops you? Test your reflexes and unleash the unstoppable force of the raging bull!
instructions: Move Left/Right – Swipe on your phone screen or move your mouse to steer the bull.

title: Passenger Sort
description: All aboard! Can you organize the passengers correctly? In this fun and challenging sorting puzzle, your goal is to move passengers to the right seats based on their color, ticket, or group. Think fast, plan ahead, and keep the journey smooth!
instructions: Tap and tap

title: Tricky Castle
description: The knight finds himself in a medieval castle full of tricky traps and puzzles. His goal is to escape by overcoming dangerous levels. Help the hero get out of this treacherous place and test your skills in our thrilling platformer!
instructions: On the computer, the default controls use the keys A, D, W, and Space. The W key or Space is used for jumping, allowing the hero to overcome obstacles and reach higher platforms. The A key moves left, and D moves right. For players on mobile devices, standard touch controls are available. Virtual buttons for moving left and right, as well as a separate button for jumping, are displayed on the screen

title: Supermarket Shopping For Kids
description: Have you ever dreamed of owning your own supermarket? In this casual supermarket simulator game, you can make your dream come true! In our Supermarket Shopping For Kids game, you can not only enjoy shopping but also play as a cashier and check out items! Apart from that, there are also many fun mini-games you can join in the supermarket.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Coin Merge
description: Coin Merge invites players into a captivating challenge of organization and strategy. Begin by sorting coins by color into designated slots, strategically merging them once a slot is filled to create new, uniquely colored coins. As levels progress, the pace quickens and the challenge intensifies, demanding swift decision-making and careful planning to keep up with the increasing complexity. Engage your mind in this addictive puzzle game where efficiency and foresight lead to mastery.
instructions: Sorting coins by color into designated slots, merging them once a slot is filled to create new
developer: Guangzhou Yomitoo Network Technology Co., Ltd.

title: Drive-in Cinema: Idle Game
description: Drive-in Cinema: Idle Game lets you build your perfect movie theater and run a profitable business. Choose the best films to satisfy guests and increase income. Expand parking, open snack kiosks, automate processes, and hire employees to optimize operations. Complete over 50 missions, enjoy colorful 3D graphics, and immerse yourself in a unique atmosphere. Buy movies, prepare snacks, and grow your theater to attract more viewers. Ready to become the top drive-in owner?
instructions: How to play Drive-in Cinema: Idle Game? - Manage the theater: Your task is to manage the drive-in cinema by selecting movies, serving snacks and creating a comfortable atmosphere for the audience. - Buy movies of different genres and keep track of their popularity. - Grow your business: Buy new steamer seats, open new food and drink stands, hire employees to speed up processes. - Manage finances - Complete missions

title: Tap Gallery
description: Tap Gallery is the ultimate puzzle game where you test your brain and tap away blocks to uncover hidden images. This iq game challenges your logical thinking and provides satisfying puzzle-solving experiences that relieve anxiety. Each tap puzzle is a unique brain teaser designed to engage and entertain, making it one of the most addicting games in the puzzle genre.
instructions: – Tap Blocks to Solve Puzzles: Tap on the blocks with arrows to move them – Strategize Your Moves: Plan your taps carefully to clear the blocks in the most efficient way possible. The more you play, the more you improve your puzzle-solving skills – Use Boosters: When stuck, tap it away with the help of boosters to remove multiple blocks at once – Master the Game: Become a tap master by completing increasingly difficult tap puzzles and unlocking new levels of brain-teasing challenges

title: Sticker Book Puzzle Color By Number
description: Discover Sticker Book Puzzle: Color By Number, a unique blend of coloring and puzzles! Match stickers, solve brain-teasing challenges, and create stunning masterpieces. Relax with calming artwork and enjoy the fun of adult coloring like never before!
instructions: Click on the sticker picture at the bottom of the screen and drag it to the appropriate area of the picture to eventually see a complete picture.

title: Doggi
description: The Doggi is Adventure with Hidden Objects and Puzzles. Easy controls, simple game mechanics. Play to kill time and relax. The game doesn't require a super force and ability. This game won't bring you to hell and make you sweat. The game has hints. The game performs in the genre of finding hidden objects with puzzles. The game has nice hand-drawn graphics. The player needs to help a little dog named Doggi collect all the hidden bones.
instructions: Find and pick up items, then use and apply them, memorize passwords, open locks, doors, boxes. If you have problem playing through the game, you can get a Hint at any time without leaving the game. You can also Skip any puzzle if it doesn’t like or will block the game. Controls: - Click or Tap - to take an item or Interactive/Action. - Drag and Drop - to apply item from the inventory.

title: Marathon Race io
description: In Marathon Race io, players take on the role of a runner who strives to become the fastest athlete on the planet. Players start at a basic level and can improve runner skills such as speed, endurance, income, etc. The more the player covers the distance, the more opportunities there are to improve skills and collect bonuses.
instructions: The goal of the game is to become the winner of the running marathon. To do this, you need to improve your characteristics and wear better quality clothes. Control: touch/click

title: Merge Balls Shooter 2048 Connect Fruits
description: Dive into Merge Balls Shooter 2048 Connect Fruits! Combine fruit balls in this unique blend of 2048 and billiards. Enjoy ASMR sounds, complete juicy levels, and compete with others. Master your merging skills and embark on a fun fruit-filled adventure today!
instructions: Aim the fruit balls with the same numbers at each other to get extra balls and get new fruit balls and complete the level.

title: Sticker Jam Peel Off & Match
description: Play Sticker Jam, the ultimate matching puzzle game! Peel vibrant stickers, match colors, and solve fun challenges. Relax and unwind with this unique blend of calming gameplay and brain-teasing puzzles. Perfect for hours of entertainment—start playing now!
instructions: Peel Off Stickers: Tap to remove stickers from the board. Match Colors: Find and match three identical stickers or colors to clear them. Solve Puzzles: Complete each level by matching all stickers and unlock new levels with more complex sticker-peeling challenges.

title: Zumba Story
description: Explore every corner of the jungle, create combinations and shoot colorful marbles. With each level, face unique challenges and utilize powerful boosters to enhance your skills. Unlock exciting chapters, conquer obstacles, and experience a vibrant journey full of surprises!
instructions: Endless marble-matching challenges are presented in this game. Aim and shoot to link three or more marbles of the same color to clear them. Players must clear all marbles that come into play or finish levels within a set time. Use three boosters - Bomb, Laser, and Rainbow - to aid in progress.

title: Idle Egg Farmer
description: Step into the world of Idle Egg Farmer, a relaxing and rewarding farm simulation game where you hatch animals, collect eggs, and grow your farm empire! Start by clicking on an egg in the pen to hatch a new animal. These animals will continuously produce eggs over time, which are then collected by trucks and delivered for profit. The more animals you have, the more eggs you generate, leading to bigger earnings and endless expansion.
instructions: Hatch animals, collect eggs, upgrade your farm, and build a thriving egg empire in Idle Egg Farmer!

title: Mosquito Bite 3d
description: Play the role of a buzzing mosquito and start a fun simulator. Flying through various environments to find your target and attack her. Your goal is to find the best moment to sneak up on your target and bite her. Your tasks such as attacking a human's head or legs. But be careful, your target might swat at you at any time.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Shine Seek
description: Memorize the obstacle positions in just 3 seconds, then navigate carefully to dodge them and grab the diamond! Stay focused, react quickly, and test your memory skills as you avoid hidden dangers. Every level presents new challenges with different obstacle patterns, making each round more exciting and unpredictable.
instructions: 1️⃣ Memorize the Obstacles – You have 3 seconds to remember their positions. 2️⃣ Dodge Carefully – Move skillfully to avoid hitting obstacles. 3️⃣ Reach the Diamond – Navigate safely and collect the diamond to win. 4️⃣ Challenge Yourself – Levels get harder with more obstacles to dodge!

title: Hole And Fill Collect Master
description: You are invited to join Hole And Fill Collect Master. Here, you will play as a magical “hole”, by devouring and collecting all kinds of food to fill yourselves and become more and more powerful. The goal is to collect as much food in the scene as possible, such as cakes, meat, donuts, etc. The bigger the item you eat, the faster you upgrade.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Goal Rush
description: Goal Rush is a fast-paced neon football showdown where precision and quick reflexes lead to victory! Play solo against a challenging AI or compete in thrilling 1v1 battles with a friend. With dynamic arenas, tricky obstacles, and intense goal-scoring action, every match feels fresh and exciting. Outsmart your opponent, master the controls, and dominate the field in this minimal yet action-packed football experience! Are you ready to take on the challenge and score the ultimate goal?
instructions: Use WASD/ZQSD or Arrow keys for playing

title: Last War Survival
description: The end is near. The world is no longer peaceful. In this game full of gunfights, zombies, and strategic challenges, you'll battle the evil zombies. Solving number puzzles to unleash your tactical genius. In Last War Survival, you'll play as a survivor in a world ravaged by a zombie virus.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Coin Merge Machine
description: An unusual game in the 2048 genre variation! Merge similar coins to get more valuable ones! Try to reach the maximum without overfilling the glass! Will you be able to get to the main coin of the game - 100 gold?
instructions: The rules of "Coin Merge Machine" are simple. By clicking the mouse or tapping the screen, drop coins onto the field. Merge similar coins to get more valuable ones. Keep them under the dotted line. The game will over if coin will stay beyond it for a few seconds. Your main goal is to reach 100 gold - the biggest coin in the game.

title: BOMBAMAN 3D
description: Blast your way through a thrilling 3D adventure! Use bombs to destroy obstacles, defeat monsters, and uncover power-ups. Find the hidden gate before time runs out, battle bosses, and unlock upgrades. Play solo or with a friend for nonstop action-packed fun!
instructions: Use W A S D or Arrow keys to move. Press Spacebar to place a bomb. The bomb explodes after 3 seconds. Bombs placed side by side trigger each other. You have 99 seconds for each level. Collect clocks from boxes to extend this time. You can increase the number and range of bombs with various power-ups. You need to hit the boss 3 times with bombs to defeat it.

title: Puzzle About Orange
description: Puzzle About Orange – A fun and challenging puzzle game! Test your brain with this addictive puzzle game! Move the orange pieces and assemble them into a complete shape before time runs out. Can you solve all the levels? ?✨
instructions: ✔️ Drag and move the orange puzzle pieces ✔️ Fit them together to form a complete shape ✔️ Beat the clock to complete each level ⏳ ✔️ Challenge yourself with increasingly difficult puzzles!

title: Zoo Shap
description: Are you ready to put your brain to the test? ZooShap: Puzzle Game is a thrilling blend of logic, deduction, and strategy that challenges you to push your critical thinking and problem-solving skills to new heights. Use your wit and a touch of luck to solve puzzles made up of 24 unique shape-color combinations called Shaplors. Your goal is to guess the correct answer key by selecting five Shaplors from the grid.
instructions: Use the mouse to click on the select animal shapes on the grid.Your goal is to guess the correct answer key by selecting five Shaplors from the grid.

title: Slingshot Master
description: Take aim with a powerful slingshot, launch your hero through the air, and eliminate stickman foes in exciting, dynamic levels. With easy-to-learn controls, you’ll quickly master the art of launching, facing new challenges and enemies with every level.
instructions: LMB: Hold and drag to aim

title: Idle Dairy Farm Tycoon
description: Idle Dairy Farm Tycoon is a relaxing and strategic idle game where players grow and manage their very own dairy business. Start by raising cows to produce milk, process raw milk then deliver the fresh milk packages to the market. Automate processes, upgrade your workers and warehouse to maximize efficiency and profits. Your goal is to build the ultimate dairy empire! Perfect for players who enjoy business simulation games.
instructions: Click or tap on the workers to carry the raw milk. Click or tap on the factory to send the milk packages to the warehouse. Click or tap on the truck to start delivering milk packages to the market. Upgrade your workers and warehouse wisely to automate the works and make profits efficiently. You can play mini games as well to earn bonuses, or try your luck with the lucky wheel.

title: Paint Sponges Puzzle
description: Challenge your logic and strategy in this exciting puzzle game! Swipe to move the sponge and color every square in the maze with vibrant colors. It might seem straightforward, but don’t be fooled! Each level brings more complex mazes to test your problem-solving skills. Plan carefully, avoid traps, and complete all levels. Sharpen your mind and enjoy victories in this colorful adventure!
instructions: Swipe to move the sponge and paint all the squares in the maze to complete the level.

title: Ball Mania!
description: Ball Mania is an addictive little ball runner game. You never know what the future holds and a path full of unexpected obstacles awaits your exploration. Slide to control the little ball to move left and right, and then turn the corner, you have to be very careful, or you risk falling! This is a great test of the player's reaction ability, can you succeed in the challenge? Simply click the big play button to start having fun.
instructions: -Slide to move -Avoid falling off -Reach end goal

title: Wreck The Tower
description: Take control of a powerful tank and unleash destruction in Wreck The Tower, an explosive demolition game where precision and power determine your success! Your mission is simple: demolish buildings by firing your tank’s bullets repeatedly until the structure collapses. But be careful not to hit the moving walls. If you hit them, your bullet will ricochet back toward you, adding an extra challenge to your aim.
instructions: Blast through buildings with your tank, aim carefully to avoid ricochets, and unlock new areas in this action-packed demolition game!

title: Spin Spin
description: Connect positive and negative battery terminals in an alternating pattern (positive, negative, positive…) to complete the circuit and power up!
instructions: Drag and drop

title: Dye It Right: Color Picker
description: Welcome to the wonderful world of Dye It Right: Color Picker, where creativity meets fun! In this casual puzzle game, you’ll begin a colorful journey. This game is filled with exciting challenges designed for kids and the young at heart.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Tangled Snakes - Sort Puzzle
description: Untangle all the tangled snakes in this fun and satisfying puzzle game! Tangled Snakes – Sort Puzzle is a relaxing yet challenging brain teaser where you must sort and free the snakes from their tangled mess. Strategically move them in the correct order to clear each level and put your problem-solving skills to the test! Can you untangle them all? Features: Simple & intuitive controls! Mind-teasing gameplay! Hundreds of unique levels! Endless fun for all ages!
instructions: Easy tap and sort mechanic. Tap to move the snake in the correct order and beware of traps and obstacles to clear the level.

title: Drive To Survive
description: Dive into the world of the zombie apocalypse, where your car is the only weapon! Shoot down hordes of zombies, earn money and unlock new powerful cars. Earn money - use your skills to become a master of survival! Buy cars - from classics to supercars! Explore new locations - each level is full of challenges! Show the zombies who's boss!
instructions: Objective of the game: Clear the location of zombies using drift in your car. Controls on a mobile device: - Turn left: Tap on the left side of the screen. - Turn right: Tap on the right side of the screen. Combo: Knock down several zombies in a row to activate a combo and earn more money! Money: Earned money can be used to buy new cars in the store. Improve your arsenal and become a drift master in the fight against zombies!

title: Dragon Island Idle 3d
description: Welcome to Dragon Island Idle 3D, a casual idle 3D world. Raise your dragons and build a wonderful island empire. Unlock all facilities to get income. For example, unlock a new pasture to raise more dinos. Unlock synths for the new area. Unlock the incubator to get dinos.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Woop Crawl Up
description: Woop Crawl Up – A Tricky Worm Puzzle Adventure! Help the little worm crawl its way home! Use solid earth blocks to support its movement, but be careful—if you move into an area without support, you’ll fall and lose! Plan your path wisely and test your puzzle-solving skills in this challenging yet fun adventure!
instructions: ✔️Move the worm carefully through the level ✔️ Use hard earth blocks for support ✔️ Avoid unsupported areas or you'll lose! ✔️ Reach home safely to complete the level!

title: Sort: My Parking Area
description: It's time to leave the parking lot, but other cars are blocking your way! Move them in the right order to clear the path! Tight parking spaces, challenging obstacles, and unexpected challenges await you in this exciting and engaging game.
instructions: PC - Draw a course by holding LMB in the direction you want the car to go Mobile device - Swipe your finger in the direction you want the driver to go

title: Tower Wars Arena
description: Fight in the arena in a unique strategy with elements of real-time strategies and tower defense! Capture the center, increase your army and destroy enemy towers. Upgrade units and spells to legendary levels to achieve victory!
instructions: Controls: Placing Units and Spells: Units and spells can be placed in the arena in two ways: 1. Drag the selected unit or spell onto the arenas to place them in the desired position. 2. Click on the unit or spell icon to select it, then select a place in the arena to place it.

title: sprunki clicker & merge phase 3
description: Sprunki Clicker & Merge: Phase 3 is an exciting rhythm-based idle game where you tap to earn money and unlock new Sprunki creatures! Each Sprunki has a unique musical beat, and as you merge them, you create richer, more dynamic melodies. Grow your collection, upgrade your beats, and become the ultimate Sprunki maestro!
instructions: ? Click to Earn: Tap along with the beat to generate coins and unlock new Sprunkis. The better your timing, the bigger your rewards! ? Merge & Upgrade: Combine two identical Sprunkis to evolve them into a stronger, more musical version, enhancing your soundscape and earnings.

title: Bow And Arrow
description: ? Bow and Arrow – Master Your Archery Skills! ? Step into the world of precision shooting in Bow and Arrow! Test your skills, aim with accuracy, and hit your targets in a variety of exciting levels. Whether you're shooting at moving targets, battling enemies, or competing in archery challenges, this game will put your skills to the test!
instructions: Use your mouse (left side) to shoot

title: Physics Box 2
description: Get ready for a fun and challenging physics game with 45 levels to complete. Easy to play but challenging to complete. Just tap or click on the screen to shoot an impulse out of the box that will make it move. Trickly levels will have you getting the box to buttons to open gates, avoiding sawtooth obstacles and making the box invincible to laser gates.
instructions: Just tap or click on the game to shoot an impulse in that direction to get the box flying.

title: Light Line
description: Can you fill this maze with a single touch? Light Line is a game where you fill in every empty square with a single touch. Try harder stages as much as possible. Move the light lines to the delight of filling in the blanks perfectly.
instructions: There are random shape of continuing blocks and one of them are colored. Start with touching the colored box, continually slide all the blocks to fill all the spaces. You should not take off the finger while sliding. If you are stuck with certain stage, you can check the free hints or paid hints with watching an ad.

title: Save My Pet
description: Save My Pet is a fun and addictive puzzle game where you must protect your adorable pet from a swarm of angry bees! Using your creativity, draw a protective barrier around your pet to keep it safe from danger. But be careful, your lines must hold for a few seconds while the bees try to break through! With increasing difficulty, unique challenges, this game will test your problem-solving skills and quick thinking. Can you keep your pet safe from harm? Play Save My Pet now and find out!
instructions: Follow the game instructions!

title: Jelly Run 2048
description: Jelly Run 2048 is a challenging casual puzzle game that combines the classic 2048 number merging with exciting parkour gameplay. Guide your jelly block by swiping left or right to connect and disconnect cubes. Merge cubes to get double the number, reaching 2048 or greater. When the jelly block collides with tiles of the same number, they merge into a larger number.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Idle Supermarket Tycoon
description: Build and manage your dream shopping mall! Expand by adding new shops, upgrade interiors, serve customers, and boost your reputation. Invest wisely, assign priority shoppers, and earn extra income with delivery vehicles. Complete missions to unlock rewards!
instructions: Use the left mouse button to interact with the in-game UI. Plus and minus keys = change the size of the camera.

title: Gluttony
description: In Gluttony, you control a giant hole with an endless appetite! Move around, swallow everything in sight, and grow bigger. But be careful—you're allergic to the little cute monsters! Avoid them at all costs while feasting on everything else.
instructions: 1. Move the hole to devour everything in sight. 2. Avoid the little cute monsters—they're dangerous!

title: Sweet business of cats: cakes
description: An exciting game in which you have to interact with a variety of objects, manage cells and create delicious cakes based on original recipes. 31 unique cakes! 6 ingredients that can be combined! More than a 13 000 customers!
instructions: Drag a coin to buy a random ingredient. Drag an ingredient to the cake cell to start baking. Tap the oven to bake. Feed the cat by dragging food onto it—it'll eat, pay, and leave. To refund a coin, drag the ingredient to the plate. If an ingredient is in the cake box, double-click or use "clear cells" to refund. Giving the wrong cake may upset the customer.

title: Bomby
description: In Bomby, your mission is simple but challenging—arrange the blocks provided to guide the adorable chicks back to their nest! Use logic, strategy, and creativity to solve each puzzle and ensure the chicks find their way home safely.
instructions: Pull the slingshot and shoot the bird into the nest

title: Pull The Pins
description: Pull the Pins is a strategic puzzle game where you must carefully pull pins in the correct order to rescue a young boy and make him reach his brother. Each decision matters, as a wrong move could lead to failure. Plan your actions wisely and use problem-solving skills to ensure a successful rescue.
instructions: Tap or mouse click to play!
